name: Zombie Runner V2
description:
This is the second attempt at Zombie Runner as the original version went corrupt.

The original game was made by a group of people who were wanting to learn game development and as a teaching medium we decided to create a simple endless runner with different mechanics to most other endless runners. 

You characters stamina does slowly deplete. 

Only Android application available at the moment.  Game instantly starts and once you have died, the game will restart - Work on the menu and HUD will be starting soon.
